----
+++ General
The short_hint attribute displays a tooltip for the link of the page, that it is defined for. It's format is:
	* \[short_hint: _short hint text_].
[PageLinkShortHint|This page] has a short hint with the value: "This is a short hint for the \PageLinkShortHint page" defined for it. When the mouse is held over it's link for a moment, it wil show up as a tooltip. This will work both in the editor and in preview. Whith exported html it might depend on the browser used.

*Remarks*
	* Short_hint only works on links in pages; not on links in the treeview or other view windows.
